attributes.action: Re-evaluate funding given to centres helping those with mental/physical needs.
attributes.additional_details: There is also a general lack of awareness surrounding the issue of mental heath and physical disabilities, meaning people have a lack of knowledge surrounding the issue because the government do not address the topic as much as they should. If the goverment re-evaluate their approach towards mental heath and physical disabilites, more awareness could be raised and potentially more centres could be opened, with more volunteers and staff.
attributes.background: Since 2010, the funding for mental health has slowly decreased. Studies show that mental heath funding has been cut by around £600m. This has resulted in closure of day centres and loss of staff leading to further closure. We feel that the government need to address this and provide extra funding.
